title: Cathodic Protection Monitoring
description: An integrity engineer checks the status of the cathodic protection system, which prevents corrosion on a steel gas pipeline.

tasks.description: Retrieve the latest pipe-to-soil potential readings from remote test points along the pipeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: System gathers the latest voltage readings.

tasks.description: Compare the readings against the required protection levels (e.g., more negative than -850 mV).
tasks.expected_outcome: System identifies a section where the potential is less negative than the required level, indicating under-protection.

tasks.description: Create a work order for a technician to investigate the issue, which could be a rectifier failure or a damaged anode.
tasks.expected_outcome: System dispatches a technician to troubleshoot the cathodic protection system.
